product_name: The North Face Allabout Rain Jacket - Men's
long_description: A stylish, waterproof, breathable rain shell, The North Face Allabout Jacket performs as well as it looks. Wear it on hikes, to the ballgame or any place you might get wet. HyVent(R) 2-layer polyester fabric is seam sealed, waterproof/breathable and windproof. Body is mesh lined for comfort; arms are nylon lined to glide on and off easily. Adjustable hood and hem cinch cord seal out weather. Brushed chin guard offers next-to-skin comfort. Exposed center-front zipper is backed with a stormflap. Secure-zip hand pockets; 1 media pocket; elastic cuffs. The North Face Allabout Jacket for men stows in its own pocket.
short_description: A stylish, waterproof, breathable rain shell, The North Face Allabout Jacket performs as well as it looks. Wear it on hikes, to the ballgame or any place you might get wet.
